sql.query:
SELECT salt AS saltvalue, user_tpin, id, md_id, ds_id
FROM m_users AS m_users
WHERE user_type BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND u_status = '1' AND blank2 = :P1 /* {{$_POST.username}} */

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countmdt
FROM m_users AS m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.md_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countdt
FROM m_users AS m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.ds_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountIds
FROM tt_recharge_trans AS tt_recharge_trans
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.ComplainId}} */ AND extra2 IS NULL

INSERT INTO t_ticket
(user_id, support_type, message, tran_id, status, adddate, created_on) VALUES (:P1 /* {{identity}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.subject}} */, :P3 /* {{$_POST.complainReason}} */, :P4 /* {{$_POST.ComplainId}} */, :P5 /* {{1}} */, :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, :P7 /* {{NOW}} */)

UPDATE tt_recharge_trans
SET extra2 = '1'
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.ComplainId}} */

options.value: Transaction Id Mismatched or Complain Already Raised
